title: What Do I Say to Her?: The Introvert's Guide to Conversation & Flirting
features: You see a beautiful woman, but what do you say to her? How do you start a conversation? How do you make it interesting and personal? How do you flirt with her?Guys have trouble with these questions all the time, but for introverted men, the challenges are often greater. Introverts don't have as much social experience, so they may be unsure of themselves.Introverted guys may not know the right thing to say. They may not be skilled at flirting or generating sexual interest.This book gives you the information you need to have compelling and interesting conversations with women, and to flirt with women and increase the sexual energy. Special attention is given to the unique strengths and challenges of introverted guys.By employing simple concepts like leading, observing the situation, risk-taking, persistence, and being honest and genuine, you can have fun, flirtatious conversations with women easily.This ebook contains useful ideas, practical examples and recommendations, and actual real-life dialogues that the author has had with attractive women."What Do I Say to Her?" will help you develop your own conversational and flirting style and have successful interactions with attractive women.
description: I'm Justin, a lifelong student of human sexual attraction and social dynamics. I write about attraction, seduction, gender issues and personal growth for the introverted, intellectual man with a modern worldview.I have been studying and practicing "pickup" and seduction since about 2009, and I have been coaching guys in New York City and over Skype since 2012.Through my in-person coaching, blogging and writing, I have helped tons of men to become more attractive to women, to understand women, to learn how attraction works, and to take risks, push themselves, communicate honestly and get results.Ultimately, I hope to help guys empower themselves to live life and pursue their goals with honesty and without apology.
